features.name: Root layout and global theming
features.description: Next.js app router layout with global styles, font setup, and theme provider integrating dark/light modes.

features.name: Landing page composition
features.description: Top-level page that assembles hero and content sections (about, services, work, contact) plus footer and global overlays.

features.name: UI component library
features.description: Reusable UI primitives (buttons, dialogs, forms, navigation, feedback components, etc.) built on Radix UI and Tailwind for consistent styling.

features.name: Custom hooks
features.description: Small hooks for device detection, scroll/visibility reveal animations, and toast notifications.

features.name: Utility functions
features.description: Shared utility helpers for class name merging and other small cross-cutting concerns.
